solution_line_template: Sarah saved 1/3 of her {total_cupcakes} cupcakes to give Michael, so she has {fraction_left_sarah} x {total_cupcakes} = <<{fraction_left_sarah}*{total_cupcakes}={cupcakes_left_sarah}>>{cupcakes_left_sarah} cupcakes left.

Michael saves {cookies_from_michael} of his cookies for Sarah, which she adds to her {cupcakes_left_sarah}. Sarah has {cookies_from_michael} + {cupcakes_left_sarah} = <<{cookies_from_michael}+{cupcakes_left_sarah}={total_desserts_sarah}>>{total_desserts_sarah} desserts.
